description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国外交官及政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央外事工作委员会办公室主任、国务委员、中华人民共和国外交部部长等职务。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat and politician of the Communist Party of China, who has served as a member of the Politburo, Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, State Councilor, and Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who is the current General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物和高级外交官，现任中共中央政治局委员、中央外事工作委员会办公室主任，曾任外交部长、国务委员。
description.en: Chinese politician and senior diplomat, currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP and Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, who previously served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and State Councilor.

description.zh-cn: 中国高级外交官，曾任国务委员、中央外事工作领导小组办公室主任。
description.en: A senior Chinese diplomat who served as State Councilor and Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Leading Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部部长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat who served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 杨洁篪的夫人，曾与杨洁篪一同被派往英国进修。
description.en: Wife of Yang Jiechi, studied in the UK with him.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任美国第41任总统。
description.en: American politician who served as the 41st President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任国务院港澳事务办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat who served as the Director of the Hong Kong and Macau Affairs Office of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家、外交家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese statesman, military leader, and diplomat who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、战略家、理论家和诗人，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founding father of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家，南京大学历史学系教授，曾担任杨洁篪的博士导师。
description.en: Chinese historian, professor at the Department of History of Nanjing University, and was Yang Jiechi's doctoral supervisor.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府官员和外交官，现任美国国务卿。
description.en: American government official and diplomat serving as the current United States Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府官员，现任美国国家安全事务助理。
description.en: American government official serving as the current United States National Security Advisor.

description.zh-cn: 杨洁篪的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Yang Jiechi.

nodes.id: 中央外事工作委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央外事工作委员会办公室
中央外事工作领导小组办公室
en: Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央外事工作委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成人员之一，是国家级副职领导人。
description.en: A member of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, holding a rank equivalent to a vice-premier.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部部长

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部部长
en: Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部的负责人职位。
description.en: The head position of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

en: Ambassador of China to the United States

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国派驻美利坚合众国的最高级别外交使节。
description.en: The highest-ranking diplomatic representative of the People's Republic of China to the United States of America.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局委员

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局委员
en: Member of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局的组成人员，是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的党和国家领导人。
description.en: A member of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party, who is one of the party and state leaders of the CCP and the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 上海外国语大学附属外国语学校

zh-cn: 上海外国语大学附属外国语学校

en: London School of Economics and Political Science

description.zh-cn: 美国总统拜登任期内，中美两国高层首次举行的面对面会谈。
description.en: The first face-to-face meeting between high-level officials from China and the United States during President Joe Biden's term.

relationships.target: 中央外事工作委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央外事工作委员会办公室主任期间，向中共中央总书记习近平汇报工作。
description.en: As Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, he reported to CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 在担任国务委员期间，向时任国务院总理李克强汇报工作。
description.en: As a State Councilor, he reported to then-Premier of the State Council Li Keqiang.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部部长

description.zh-cn: 在担任外交部长期间，向时任国务院总理温家宝汇报工作。
description.en: As Minister of Foreign Affairs, he reported to then-Premier of the State Council Wen Jiabao.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局委员
上海外国语大学附属外国语学校

description.zh-cn: 杨洁篪在南京大学攻读博士学位时，钱乘旦是其导师。
description.en: Qian Chengdan was Yang Jiechi's supervisor when he was pursuing his doctoral degree at Nanjing University.

description.zh-cn: 杨洁篪与王光亚在上海外国语学院附属中学就读时是室友。
description.en: Yang Jiechi and Wang Guangya were roommates while studying at the Shanghai Foreign Language School.

description.zh-cn: 受文化大革命的影响，杨洁篪于1968年被迫中止学业。
description.en: Affected by the Cultural Revolution, Yang Jiechi was forced to drop out of school in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 1972年尼克松访华后，周恩来指示加速培养外语人才，杨洁篪因此被选中派到国外留学。
description.en: After Nixon's visit to China in 1972, Zhou Enlai instructed to accelerate the training of foreign language talents, which led to Yang Jiechi being selected to study abroad.

description.zh-cn: 根据1971年毛泽东的指示精神，中国选拔了一批学生到国外留学，杨洁篪是其中之一。
description.en: Following Mao Zedong's instructions in 1971, China selected a group of students to study abroad, and Yang Jiechi was among them.

description.zh-cn: 在事件发生后，时任驻美大使的杨洁篪在外交层面进行斡旋，全力化解危机。
description.en: After the incident, Yang Jiechi, then ambassador to the US, worked at the diplomatic level to resolve the crisis.

description.zh-cn: 为杨洁篪取了“老虎杨”（Tiger Yang）的绰号。
description.en: Gave Yang Jiechi the nickname 'Tiger Yang'.

description.zh-cn: 1977年，乔治·H·W·布什访问中国时，杨洁篪担任其全程陪同翻译。
description.en: In 1977, when George H. W. Bush visited China, Yang Jiechi served as his full-time accompanying interpreter.
